summary: A comprehensive pytest suite that validates DynamoDB functionality using boto3 and the Moto mock library. It covers table creation, item CRUD, queries, scans, batch operations, transactions, condition and update expressions, pagination, TTL, CloudFormation integration, export/import, resource policies, consumed capacity handling, and table updates, ensuring correct behavior in a simulated AWS environment.
business_intent: Provide thorough automated testing to guarantee the reliability and correctness of DynamoDB-related code and client libraries, facilitating regression detection and supporting development of AWS-integrated applications.
